Implementation


<dl>
    <dt>Turbocharger</dt>
    <dd>a turbine-driven forced induction device that increases an engine's efficiency and power by forcing extra air into the combustion chamber</dd>
    <dt>Intake valve</dt>
    <dd>a valve in the cylinder head of an internal-combustion engine that opens at the proper moment in the cycle to allow the fuel-air mixture to be drawn into the cylinder</dd>
</dl>
